/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance and the cloud cover. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and urban elements of the scene.
